problem_text_cn: 如图,半圆O的直径AE=4,点B,C,D均在半圆上,若AB=BC,CD=DE,连接OB,OD,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the diameter of the semicircle O is AE = N_0, and the points B, C, and D are all on the semicircle. If AB = BC, CD = DE, connect OB and OD, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
